title: Petrified Forest National Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      The park is open year round except Christmas, December 25.Petrified Forest National Park is open at different hours during the year. Hour Changes (times are Mountain Standard year round-this area does not observe Daylight Saving):Park Road Hours:January 1-February 20 8am-5pmFebruary 21-April 2 7am-6:30pmApril 3-April 30 7am-7pmMay 1-May 28 7am-7:30pmMay 29-July 23 7am-8pmJuly 24-August 20 7am-7:30pmAugust 21-Sept 17 7am-7pmSept 18-October 29 7am-6pmOctober 30-Dec 31 8am-5pmFacilitiesPainted Desert Visitor Center and Rainbow Forest MuseumJanuary 1-February 20 8am-5pmFebruary 21-April 2 7am-6pmApril 3-Sept 17 7am-7pmSept 18-October 29 7am-6pmOctober 30-Dec 31 8am-5pmPainted Desert Inn National Historic LandmarkDaily 9am–5pmPark and Visitor Center hours are subject to change. Note: Arizona does not observe Daylight Saving Time, remaining on Mountain Standard Time year-round. For example, in the summer months, during Daylight Saving Time, the time in Arizona and California is the same, with New Mexico and the Navajo Reservation one hour ahead.       Painted Desert Inn National Historic Landmark Hallie Larsen/NPS
